text: Abdulsamed Abdullahi (; born 19 January 1999) is a Somali professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Greek Super League 2 club Ergotelis and the Somalia national team. ==Club career== Abdullahi signed his first professional contract with FC Den Bosch on 9 August 2019. Abdullahi made his professional debut with Jong PSV on 12 August 2019. ==International career== Born in the Netherlands, Abdullahi is of Somali descent. Abdullahi represented the Somalia national football team in a 1–0 2022 FIFA World Cup qualification win over Zimbabwe on 5 September 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Tilburg Category:Association football midfielders Category:Somalian footballers Category:Somalia international footballers Category:Dutch footballers Category:Dutch people of Somali descent Category:FC Den Bosch players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Tweede Divisie players Category:Ergotelis F.C. players Category:Super League Greece 2 players
title: Abdulsamed Abdullahi
